content: star garland crochet pattern by natalia kononova at www outstandingcrochet com for pattern support contact natalia outstandingcrochet@gmail com join my newsletter list to never miss a new kononova or downloaded it for free please delete file immediately from all your devices and report link to natalia kononova@outstandingcrochet com thank you  please do not share my patterns as it takes a lot of hard work and time to design write photograph and put together crochet patterns designing is my full time job and i won t be able to do it if my patterns are distributed for free copyright violation is not a vic- tim-less crime thank you  terms of use  you may sell finished items based on my patterns please follow this regulations  this material can not be used for any type of mass production/ manufacturing  keep a copy of your receipt as proof of purchase  items must be made only by the buyer  give credentials to natalia kononova at www outstandingcrochet com as the pattern designer on a tag affixed to each item and in the listing if selling on-line  you may make alterations to the pattern but you must still link to the original pattern and credit natalia kononova at www outstandingcrochet com on the item tags and listings thank you  purchasing the patterns does not remove the copyright protection of that pattern but gives you only the right to make items from it  use of any photo that belongs to natalia kononova is strictly prohibited  thank you for respecting the copyright law sizes each star is about 6 cm / 2 3/8 in diameter distance between stars is 16 cm / 6 ¼ each end with a hanging loop is 13 cm / 5 1/8 10 star garland is 170 cm / 66 7/8 length can be customized materials and tools 14 g / 43 yds of scheepjes softfun yarn dk weight 60% cotton / 40% acrylic 50g / 140 m
